publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1480# Dr Elaine Murray: Glencaple Dogs Home-That the Parliament deeply regrets the decision of the National Canine Defence League (NCDL) to close its dogs' home in Glencaple, Dumfries and Galloway; notes that this will result in there being only one NCDL home remaining in Scotland; notes the strong support within the region for retention of this facility within Dumfries and Galloway; notes the offers of land, finance and services to provide a replacement home from local individuals and businesses, and urges the NDCL to replace the facility in Dumfries and Galloway when the Glencaple home closes.
S1M-1480# Glencaple Dogs Home (lodged on 18 December 2000) Michael Russell*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1480# Glencaple Dogs Home (lodged on 18 December 2000) Bill Butler*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Nick Johnston*, David Mundell*

S1M-1480# Dr Elaine Murray: Glencaple Dogs Home—That the Parliament deeply regrets the decision of the National Canine Defence League (NCDL) to close its dogs’ home in Glencaple, Dumfries and Galloway; notes that this will result in there being only one NCDL home remaining in Scotland; notes the strong support within the region for retention of this facility within Dumfries and Galloway; notes the offers of land, finance and services to provide a replacement home from local individuals and businesses, and urges the NDCL to replace the facility in Dumfries and Galloway when the Glencaple home closes. Supported by: Michael Russell, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Bill Butler, Mr Jamie Stone, Nick Johnston, David Mundell
S1M-1480# Glencaple Dogs Home (lodged on 18 December 2000) Phil Gallie*, Mr Keith Harding*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1480# Glencaple Dogs Home (lodged on 18 December 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Alasdair Morgan*, Marilyn Livingstone*
